name: aVOID (itch)
description:
Navigate the procedural dungeon to flee from the void.
Gain score from moving further upward and discovering new rooms.

See Ludumdare page for more info.

CREDITS

Music - Rainbow Ride - Azureflux

Leaderboard Backend - dreamlo.com

Created for Ludumdare 41. 

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Genres: Dungeon Crawler / Endless Runner / Rogue-lite / Turn Based (?).

Didn't really go for the theme much, mostly focused on making something fun.
